title: Official Docker Getting Started Guide
content: The official Docker documentation explaining container architecture, images, and essential CLI commands for beginners.

title: GeeksforGeeks: Introduction to Docker
content: An overview of Docker, its purpose, how it differs from virtual machines, and the benefits of using container technology.

title: FreeCodeCamp: Docker for Beginners
content: A beginner-friendly guide covering what Docker is, how containers work, and how to use them in real-world development environments.
